skills.engeneer_paragraph: This training allows me to be rigorous, in the work that will be rendered, precise in the details and a methodical approach to succeed in giving life to your idea.
skills.toba_paragraph: here is the artist who will realize your ideas. passionate about creation, the motion desgin is the perfect expretion of a mix of videos, image and sound. a universal communication to transmit your message with the perfect emotion
